mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_dictionary ( id, uuid, item_name, dictionary_type_id, order_no, delete_flag, reversion, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{uuid}, #{itemName}, #{dictionaryTypeId}, #{orderNo}, #{deleteFlag}, #{reversion}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( max( td.uuid), 0 ) FROM tb_dictionary td WHERE td.delete_flag = 0

SELECT td.id, td.uuid, td.item_name AS itemName, td.order_no AS orderNo, td.dictionary_type_id AS dictionaryTypeId, td.delete_flag AS deleteFlag, td.reversion, td.created_by AS createdBy, td.created_time AS createdTime, td.updated_by AS updatedBy, td.updated_time AS updatedTime FROM tb_dictionary td WHERE td.id = #{id}

SELECT td.id, td.uuid, td.reversion, td.created_by AS createdBy, td.created_time AS createdTime, td.updated_by AS updatedBy, td.updated_time AS updatedTime, td.item_name AS itemName, td.order_no as orderNo, td.delete_flag as deleteFlag FROM tb_dictionary td WHERE td.delete_flag = 0
and td.item_name like concat('%',#{itemName},'%')

SELECT td.id, td.uuid, td.reversion, td.created_by AS createdBy, td.created_time AS createdTime, td.updated_by AS updatedBy, td.updated_time AS updatedTime, td.item_name AS itemName, td.order_no as orderNo, td.delete_flag as deleteFlag FROM tb_dictionary td WHERE td.delete_flag = 0 and td.dictionary_type_id = #{dictionaryTypeId} order by td.order_no asc

SELECT td.id, td.uuid, td.reversion, td.created_by AS createdBy, td.created_time AS createdTime, td.updated_by AS updatedBy, td.updated_time AS updatedTime, td.item_name AS itemName, td.order_no as orderNo, td.delete_flag as deleteFlag FROM tb_dictionary td WHERE td.delete_flag = 0 and td.item_name = #{itemName}
